content: this legal case involves two parties referred to as sklep and vrhovno sodišče rs ii dor 1372023 the appellant filed an appeal to challenge a decision made by a lower court regarding data the lower court ruled in favor of the respondent but the appellant argued that there were errors in the decision and requested the higher court to review the case the higher court reviewed the arguments and evidence and then made a decision on the appeal the court either upheld the decision of the lower court or overturned it the courts decision on the appeal is final and cannot be further challenged the case concluded on july 19 2023

metadata.CASE_ID: Sklep Vrhovnega sodišča RS II DoR 137/2023, 19. 7. 2023
